## inputs.Input.setAlign() method

Change the alignment of the connection's field(s).

**Signature:**

```typescript
setAlign(align: Align): Input;
```

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description

<tbody><tr><td>

align


</td><td>

[Align](./blockly.inputs_namespace.align_enum.md)


</td><td>

One of the values of Align. In RTL mode directions are reversed, and Align.RIGHT aligns to the left.


</td></tr>

[Input](./blockly.input_class.md)

The input being modified (to allow chaining).
